All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Admin data class
AdminController
AdminController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for Admin operations
AdminView
AdminView class used by AdminController for printing information to console using static functions
AgeClass
Enumerator class for categorizing customer age groups
AuthController
Authentication Controller controls the logic for account related operations, implements IAuthenticator.
BookingController
BookingController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for booking of movie tickets
BookingHistoryController
BookingController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for booking of movie tickets
BookingHistoryView
BookingHistoryView class used by BookingHistoryController for printing information to console using static functions
BookingState
Enumerator class for storing the various states in the booking process flow.
BookingTicket
Stores the data for a booking transaction
BookingView
BookingView class used by BookingController for printing information to console using static functions
Cinema
Stores the data for a Cinema object
CinemaType
Enumerator class for categorizing Cinema types
Cineplex
Stores the data for a Cineplex object
CineplexController
Cineplex Controller is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for Cineplex functions.
ConsoleIOManager
Manager class to store an instance of Scanner and interface with console read and write.
CoupleSeat
Stores the data for a CoupleSeat object.
Customer
Stores the data for a Customer object.
CustomerController
Customer Controller class that handles navigation logic, for Customers to pick their next function.
CustomerView
CustomerView class used by CustomerController for printing information to console using static functions
DataSeeder
DataSeeder initializes data into the DataStore if there are no previously created files
DataStoreManager
Singleton class that keeps track of data objects to be used in the lifetime of the application.
DiscountCode
Stores the data for a Discount Code object.
Holiday
Stores the data for a Holiday object.
IAuthenticator
IAuthentication interface that abstracts the authentication logic
INavigation
Navigation interface abstraction for loading of controllers
IPayment
Payment controller interface abstraction for payment method implementations
LoginController
LoginController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for login in of admin users
LoginView
LoginView class used by LoginController for printing information to console using static functions
MainController
Main Controller class that handles entry point navigation logic, for users to choose between Admin Navigation and Customer Navigation
MainView
MainView class used by MainController for printing information to console using static functions
Movie
Stores the data for a Movie object, extends a SingleInstancedSerializable
MovieEditController
MovieEditController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for booking of movie tickets
MovieEditView
MovieEditView class used by MovieEditController for printing information to console using static functions
MovieRating
Enumerator class for categorizing Movie rating types
MovieReview
Stores the data for a Reivew object
MovieStatus
Enumerator class for categorizing Movie showing status
MovieType
Enumerator class for categorizing Movie types
NavigationController
Base navigation controller class using a Facade and Singleton Pattern that keeps track of the order in which navigation controller is called and instantiates each controller accordingly.
PaymentController
PaymentController that handles the logic for processing payments
PaymentStatus
Enumerator class for Payment status to be implemented
PaymentView
PaymentView class used by PaymentController for printing information to console using static functions
ReviewController
ReviewController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for managing reviews, called after searching for movies
ReviewView
ReviewView class used by ReviewController for printing information to console using static functions
Screening
Stores the data for a screening.
ScreeningController
ScreeningController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for manage showtime
ScreeningView
ScreeningView class used by ScreeningController for printing information to console using static functions
SearchMovieController
SearchMovieController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for searching of movies
SearchMovieView
ReviewView class used by ReviewController for printing information to console using static functions
Seat
Stores the data for a Base Seat object.
SeatType
Enumerator class for categorizing Seat types
Setting
Stores the data for a Setting object.
SettingsController
SettingsController that handles the logic for modifying system configuration
SettingsView
SettingsView class used by SettingsController for printing information to console using static functions
ShowTime
Stores the data for a Showtime object.
SimplePaymentAlwaysFailure
Simple payment class that always returns unsuccessful payment
SimplePaymentAlwaysSuccess
Simple payment class that always returns successful payment
SingleInstancedSerializable
SingleInstancedSerializable implements a Java Serializable to extend its functionality
TopMovieController
TopMovieController that handles the logic for displaying top 5 movie ranking lists.
TopMovieView
TopMovieView class used by TopMovieController for printing information to console using static functions
TopMovieViewingState
Enumerator class for categorizing Top 5 Movie viewing mode states
